entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
